special: My first prize for a Math competition although I only got a silver medal.
First time I went on a trip without my parents.
It's an award after I passed the exam to my highschool. The funny thing is my mom asked the seller 'What is the modernest and most espensive mobile phone... but can't access internet?
First time I traveled abroad for studying. I flied from Vietnam to the US all by myself.
I eventually got my first laptop and I could use it without my parents' permission! My parents had been very strict about electrical devices.
I got my first paycheck as a tutor at Mission College.
I had loved a car with dark color and model of Honda or Toyota. But I ended up getting a silver Nissan Altima. As time goes by, I love it more and more!
After moving to the US, I still had to live with my aunt, so it wasn't completely independent until I transferred to UC Davis.
